item.description:
There are so many things in the professional world that scare our creative minds. Working with legal jargon is definitely at the top of the list, whether you're just starting out as a freelancer or run your own firm. But, one of the most important things we can do is protect our creativity, our ideas, and our ability to get paid!

Triple Frog design firm owner, Stacey Dyer, will share insights on the joys & jabs of project management and protecting your creativity. Open floor networking kicks off the evening, discussion to follow. Stacey assures us that it won't be as dry as the martini you're looking forward to having.
item.name: Contracts for Creatives & Project Management: Don't be a Welcome Mat!
